name: DEATH BATTLE (MIPLAY10011)
description:
You play as the main character who decided to defeat death, the battle will be long. 

As the battle progresses, you pick up various cards that both strengthen you and complicate the gameplay, open up new mechanics, etc.

Any lag bugs found in the game write in the comments, I'll try to fix it as soon as possible!

If you have ideas for the game, what to add, etc., you can write in the comments!


GAME PLANS importance 1 POSTPONED, 5 - ALREADY DOING1More Cards52New Mechanics43Spriting54Bug fixes55voice update26Multiplayer 1
